channel.title: Force.com on PR
channel.description: Recent content in Force.com on PR

item.title: Grep - Swiss army knife
item.description: I have used this command sparingly in the past and I recently learnt more options by solving couple of my problems.

item.title: iForce - Sublime text plugin for salesforce development.
item.description: I wrote a small plugin for sublime text to develop salesforce. I’m glad to share one of my idea to project execution.

item.title: Developing iOS application for salesforce [How to]
item.description: Here are the collection of snippets to do CRUD operation with ZKSforce (Force.com toolkit for iOS). Remember this is a SOAP based API, there is a new alternative library available from salesforce called MobileSDK for iOS.
